meanings.definition: A person who trusses or ties something.
meanings.sent1: The trusser carefully tied the ropes together to secure the package.
meanings.sent2: The trusser at the farm was skilled at tying knots to keep the animals safe.
meanings.sent3: The trusser joked that they could tie anything up, even a slippery fish!
meanings.sent4: She was a trusser of hearts, binding people together with her kind words.
meanings.sent5: The trusser's hands moved swiftly, creating intricate knots that held everything in place.
